channel.title: So, we need to aggressively ban Spam Fools
channel.description:
Because I'm seeing it A LOT now.
They ignore everything and spam the chat so no one else can play, get executed and are of course, Fools.
It's to the point that it's become a serious issue. In the last 2 days I've had like 3 of them.

item.title: So, we need to aggressively ban Spam Fools
